mapper.select: SELECT D.IDX, D.NAME, DS.NAME AS status, D.COMPLETION_AMOUNT AS completionAmount, D.AMOUNT, D.COMPLETION_RATE AS completionRate, D.START_DATE, D.END_DATE FROM DONATIONS D JOIN DONATION_STATUS DS ON D.IDX = DS.IDX ORDER BY D.IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}

SELECT D.IDX, D.NAME, D.START_DATE, D.END_DATE, D.AMOUNT, D.COMPLETION_AMOUNT, D.COMPLETION_RATE, D.SPONSOR, D.SPONSOR_DETAIL, D.CONTENT, DS.NAME AS status, D.CREATED_AT FROM DONATIONS D JOIN DONATION_STATUS DS ON D.DONATION_STATUS_IDX = DS.IDX WHERE D.IDX= #{idx}

SELECT D.IDX, U.NAME, DT.DONATED_AMOUNT AS donatedAmount, DT.CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM DONATION_DETAILS DT JOIN DONATIONS D ON DT.DONATION_IDX = D.IDX JOIN USERS U ON DT.USER_IDX = U.IDX WHERE DT.DONATION_IDX = #{idx} ORDER BY DT.CREATED_AT DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATIONS (USER_IDX, DONATION_STATUS_IDX, NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, AMOUNT, SPONSOR, SPONSOR_DETAIL, CONTENT) VALUES(#{userIdx}, #{statusIdx}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{amount}, #{sponsor}, #{sponsorDetail}, #{content});
mapper.update: UPDATE DONATIONS SET NAME = #{name}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, AMOUNT = #{amount}, SPONSOR = #{sponsor}, SPONSOR_DETAIL = #{sponsorDetail}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE IDX = #{idx}
